content: Yamuna River in India, originates from the Yamunotri Glacier at a height of just under 21,000 feet in the lower Himalaya. The river is worshipped as a Hindu goddess who, in Hindu scriptures, is the daughter of Surya, the sun god, and Sandhya, the dusk goddess__no.0667, 2021. #Asia #glacierfedriver #riverasgoddess #Hinduscriptures #Himalaynmountains
